I am aware that Nursery_E is highly desired by other parents (B and D also rank it 1st) and I am ranked 3rd by Nursery_E, meaning a rejection is likely if all top parents apply there. However, starting with the top choice is strategically sound. I will use the [APPLY] tag to formally propose.
